Module org.monarchinitiative.phenol.annotations
Package org.monarchinitiative.phenol.annotations.io.hpo

Class HpoDiseaseAnnotationParser

java.lang.Object
org.monarchinitiative.phenol.annotations.io.hpo.HpoDiseaseAnnotationParser
@Deprecated public class HpoDiseaseAnnotationParser extends Object
Deprecated.
as of 2.0.0. Use an instance of HpoDiseaseLoader instead.
This class parses the phenotype.hpoa file into a collection of HpoDisease objects. If errors are enountered, the line is skipped and the error is added to the list errors. Client code can ask if the parsing was error-free with the method validParse() and can retrieve the errors (if any) with getErrors().
Author:
Peter Robinson, Michael Gargano

    • loadTermToDiseaseMap

      public static Map<TermId,List<TermId>> loadTermToDiseaseMap(Path annotationFile, Ontology ontology, Set<DiseaseDatabase> databasePrefixes)
      Deprecated.
      Get a map from HPO terms to diseases. This function includes OMIM, ORPHA, and DECIPHER references.
      Parameters:
      annotationFile - path to the the phenotype.hpoa file
      ontology - reference to HPO Ontology object
      Returns:
      map with key being an HPO TermId object, and value being a list of TermIds representing diseases.

    • validParse

      public boolean validParse()
      Deprecated.
      Returns:
      true if the entire parse was error-free

    • getErrors

      public List<String> getErrors()
      Deprecated.
      Returns:
      a list of Strings each of which represents one parse error.

    • parse

      public Map<TermId,HpoDisease> parse() throws PhenolException
      Deprecated.
      Parse the phenotype.hpoa file and return a map of diseases.
      Returns:
      a map with key: disease id, e.g., OMIM:600123, and value the corresponding HpoDisease object.
      Throws:
      PhenolException

    • diseaseIdToDirectHpoTermIds

      public static Map<TermId,Collection<TermId>> diseaseIdToDirectHpoTermIds(Map<TermId,HpoDisease> diseaseMap)
      Deprecated.
      Create a mapping from diseaseIds (e.g., OMIM:600123) to the HPO terms that the disease is directly annotated to.
      Parameters:
      diseaseMap - A disease map as generated by the loadDiseaseMap(Path, Ontology) function
      Returns:
      A map from disease Ids to a collection of directly annotating HPO terms

    • hpoTermIdToDiseaseIdsDirect

      Deprecated.
      Create a mapping from HPO ids to the disease Ids they are directly annotated to.
      Parameters:
      diseaseMap - A disease map as generated by the loadDiseaseMap(Path, Ontology) function
      ontology - A reference to the HPO ontology
      Returns:
      A map from HPO ids to Disease ids (direct annotations only).
